content.en: Wireless mesh optimization: Researchers have been investigating how algorithms can improve the performance of wireless mesh networks. They have developed centralized and distributed algorithms to optimize channel assignment, routing, and flow allocation in order to maximize network throughput. These algorithms take into account factors such as congestion, capacity, and link scheduling to improve the overall capacity and efficiency of the networks.
content.da: Trådløs mesh-optimering: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan algoritmer kan forbedre ydeevnen af trådløse mesh-netværk. De har udviklet centraliserede og distribuerede algoritmer til at optimere kanalallokering, routing og flowfordeling for at maksimere netværkets gennemløb. Disse algoritmer tager højde for faktorer som overbelastning, kapacitet og linksplanlægning for at forbedre den samlede kapacitet og effektivitet af netværkene.
